Plot: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin (Spacey) specifically, and his relationship with his wife Sandra Dee (Bosworth).
Title: Beyond the Sea
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth, John Goodman, Bob Hoskins
tomatoConsensus: Kevin Spacey's bio of singer Bobby Darin is either a fearless piece of showmanship or an embarrassing vanity project, according to critics.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 nominations.
